org.treetank.io.file

Class FileWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.treetank.io.file.FileWriter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IReader, IWriter

    public final class FileWriter
extends Object
implements IWriter
    File Writer for providing read/write access for file as a treetank backend.
    Author:
    Marc Kramis, Seabix, Sebastian Graf, University of Konstanz
